import { Button, Card, CardContent, CardHeader, Grid } from '@mui/material' import React, { useState } from 'react' import InstagramIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Instagram'; import XIcon from '@mui/icons-material/X'; import FacebookIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Facebook'; import GitHubIcon from '@mui/icons-material/GitHub'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import TwitterIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Twitter'; import { updateRestaurantStatus } from '../../componet/State/Restaurant/Action'; export const RestaurantDetails = () => { const {restaurant} = useSelector((store) => store); const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleRestaurantStatus=()=>{ dispatch(updateRestaurantStatus({ restaurantId:restaurant.usersRestaurant.id, jwt:localStorage.getItem("jwt") })) } return (
